unused
Class BinaryCounter

java.lang.Object
  unused.BinaryCounter

public class BinaryCounter
extends java.lang.Object

This class is implements a binary counter. It is useful to count from 0..00, 0..01, ... ... up to 1...11.
These outputs can be used to initialize a test set of monoms

Author:
chrissy ToDo: replace with NaryCounter!

won't work for a binary counter because counter[i] is only 0 or 1. public String toSignature() { String s = ""; for(int i = 1; i < Constraints.maxIndex; i++) { switch(this.counter[i]) { case 0: case 1: s = s+"X"; case 2: s = s+"-"; } } return s; }
